mapper.select: select cat_name "cat_name", round(( select count(*) from book b where b.cat_cd=c.cat_cd )/(select count(*) from book)*100, 2) "perNum" from code_category c order by c.cat_cd

select BUSINESS_AREA_NAME "business_area_name", round(( select nvl(count(*), 0) from corporation_cus cc where cc.CORP_BUSINESS_AREA=c.business_area_code )/(select count(*) from corporation_cus)*100, 2) "perCorp" from code_business_area c order by c.business_area_code

select round( ( (select count(*) from buy_offline_info)/( (select count(*) from buy_offline_info)+(select count(*) from order_info) )*100 ), 2) "off_line", round(( (select count(*) from order_info)/( (select count(*) from buy_offline_info)+(select count(*) from order_info) )*100 ), 2) "on_line" from dual

select round(((select count(*) from order_info where is_member='y')/(select count(*) from order_info)*100), 2) "memberY", round(((select count(*) from order_info where is_member='n')/(select count(*) from order_info)*100), 2) "memberN" from dual

select round((select count(*) from employee where is_on_leave='F')/(select count(*) from employee)*100, 2) "leaveF", round((select count(*) from employee where is_on_leave='T')/(select count(*) from employee)*100, 2) "leaveT" from dual

select c.cat_name "cat_name_online", round( ( select count(*) from order_info where isbn13 in(select isbn13 from book b where b.cat_cd=c.cat_cd) )/(select count(*) from order_info)*100, 2) "peronlineorder" from code_category c

select c.cat_name "cat_name_off", round( ( select count(*) from buy_offline_info where isbn13 in(select isbn13 from book b where b.cat_cd=c.cat_cd) )/(select count(*) from buy_offline_info)*100, 2) "perofforder" from code_category c
select d.dep_name "dep_name", (select count(*) from employee e where e.dep_no=d.dep_no) "depCnt" from dept d

select sum( (select b.book_price from book b where b.isbn13 in(o.isbn13))*o.book_qty ) as "totmoneyM" ,to_char(o.order_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(o.order_dt, 'mm')||'월' as "monthsort" from order_info o where o.order_no not in (select order_no from return_sale_info) and to_char(o.order_dt, 'YYYY')='2019' group by to_char(o.order_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(o.order_dt, 'mm')||'월' order by 2 desc

select sum(o.tot_cost ) as "offtotmoney" ,to_char(o.buy_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(o.buy_dt, 'mm')||'월' as "offmonthsort" from buy_offline_info o where to_char(o.buy_dt, 'YYYY')='2019' group by to_char(o.buy_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(o.buy_dt, 'mm')||'월' order by 2 desc

select c.cat_name "cat_name_online", round( ( select count(*) from order_info where isbn13 in(select isbn13 from book b where b.cat_cd=c.cat_cd) and to_char(order_dt,'yyyymm')='2019'||#{month_choice} )/(select count(*) from order_info where to_char(order_dt,'yyyymm')='2019'||#{month_choice})*100, 2) "peronlineorder" from code_category c

select c.cat_name "cat_name_offline", round( ( select count(*) from buy_offline_info where isbn13 in(select isbn13 from book b where b.cat_cd=c.cat_cd) and to_char(buy_dt,'yyyymm')='2019'||#{month_choice} )/(select count(*) from buy_offline_info where to_char(buy_dt,'yyyymm')='2019'||#{month_choice})*100, 2) "perofflineorder" from code_category c

select * from ( select rownum "RNUM", zxcv.* from( select o.isbn13 "isbn13", (select b.book_name from book b where b.isbn13=o.isbn13) "book_name", (select c.cat_name from code_category c where c.cat_cd in(select b.cat_cd from book b where b.isbn13=o.isbn13)) "cat_name", count(*) "soldcnt" from order_info o where to_char(o.order_dt,'yymm')= to_char(add_months(sysdate, -1),'yymm') group by o.isbn13 order by "soldcnt" desc) zxcv where rownum <= 5)

select cr.return_name "return_name", round((select count(*) from return_sale_info rs where rs.return_sales_cd in(cr.return_cd) )/(select count(*) from return_sale_info)*100, 2) "perreturncnt" from code_return cr

select sum(credit_info ) as "credittot" ,to_char(occur_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(occur_dt, 'mm')||'월' as "creditmonth" from ledger_info where debit_info is null and to_char(occur_dt, 'YYYY')='2019' group by to_char(occur_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(occur_dt, 'mm')||'월' order by 2 desc

select sum(debit_info ) as "debittot" ,to_char(occur_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(occur_dt, 'mm')||'월' as "debitmonth" from ledger_info where credit_info is null and to_char(occur_dt, 'YYYY')='2019' group by to_char(occur_dt, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(occur_dt, 'mm')||'월' order by 2 desc
